title: Orchestral Fantasy Music - REALM
description: Set the scene for thrilling journeys and perilous encounters, with this collection of royalty-free orchestral fantasy music.
longDescription:
REALM is also available in our MEGAPACK - our first 10 asset packs available in one huge collection of high-quality music.


﻿Need custom audio for your game? COMMISSION US!


Set the scene for thrilling journeys and perilous encounters, with the REALM - Orchestral Fantasy game music asset pack. This collection contains 22 unique compositions, with seamlessly looping versions included.


Explore rich and detailed musical textures with craftsmanship that goes far beyond the average library track. Created by professional musicians working with ultra-realistic orchestral samples, REALM delivers the classic scoring stage sound with professional grade quality.


Featuring soaring strings, epic choir, lyrical woodwinds and harp and powerful brass and percussion, this music pack is suited for a range of situations, including exploration, battle, outdoor and indoor areas, cutscenes, main menu and more. REALM is your one stop shop for fantasy and fantasy-RPG music.


Listen to REALM HERE.

technicalDetails:

  • 22 unique compositions
  • Fixed tempos
  • Looping versions of each track (plus intro files)
  • Royalty-free
